dataRoles.name: taskId
dataRoles.description: Unique identifier for each task

dataRoles.name: duration
dataRoles.description: Task duration in work days for CPM calc

dataRoles.name: taskTotalFloat
dataRoles.description: User-provided total float value for Float-Based mode (optional)

dataRoles.name: taskFreeFloat
dataRoles.description: Free float value for each task (time before impacting successors)

dataRoles.name: startDate
dataRoles.description: Actual/Forecast start date for plotting

dataRoles.name: finishDate
dataRoles.description: Actual/Forecast finish date for plotting

dataRoles.name: baselineStartDate
dataRoles.description: Original/Baseline start date for plotting the baseline bar

dataRoles.name: baselineFinishDate
dataRoles.description: Original/Baseline finish date for plotting the baseline bar

dataRoles.name: previousUpdateStartDate
dataRoles.description: Start date from the previous update/snapshot for comparison

dataRoles.name: previousUpdateFinishDate
dataRoles.description: Finish date from the previous update/snapshot for comparison

dataRoles.name: dataDate
dataRoles.description: Status date of the schedule snapshot

dataRoles.name: taskName
dataRoles.description: Name or description of the task

dataRoles.name: taskType
dataRoles.description: Type of task (TT_Task, TT_Mile, TT_FinMile)

dataRoles.name: predecessorId
dataRoles.description: ID of predecessor task

dataRoles.name: relationshipType
dataRoles.description: Relationship type (FS, SS, FF, SF)

dataRoles.name: relationshipLag
dataRoles.description: Lag or lead time (negative lag) for relationship in work days

dataRoles.name: relationshipFreeFloat
dataRoles.description: Pre-calculated free float for each relationship (optional - will calculate if not provided)

dataRoles.name: tooltip
dataRoles.description: Additional fields to display in tooltips

dataRoles.name: legend
dataRoles.description: Categorical field to color tasks (e.g., WBS, Department, Phase)

dataRoles.name: wbsLevels
dataRoles.description: Work Breakdown Structure hierarchy levels - add fields in order from highest to lowest level (e.g., Phase, Discipline, Activity)

criticalPathColor.description: Color for critical task borders and glow

nearCriticalColor.description: Color for near-critical task borders and glow

showBaseline.description: Display baseline bars below the main task bars

baselineOffset.description: Distance between the main task bar and the baseline bar

showPreviousUpdate.description: Display previous update bars below the baseline bars

previousUpdateOffset.description: Distance between the baseline bar and the previous update bar

showConnectorToggle.description: Show or hide the connector lines toggle button in the header

showConnectorLines.description: Display connector lines between dependent tasks

elbowOffset.description: Controls the distance of connector line bends

differentiateDrivers.description: Use dashed lines and reduced opacity for non-driving relationships

dropdownWidth.description: Width of the task selection dropdown

dropdownPosition.description: Position of the task selection dropdown in the header

traceMode.description: Select whether to trace critical path backward to or forward from the selected task

fontSize.description: Base font size for finish dates and duration text

taskNameFontSize.description: Font size for task names in the left margin

labelColor.description: Color for task name and date labels

showDuration.description: Display calculated CPM duration text inside task bars

durationTextColor.description: Color for duration text inside bars (use 'Auto' for automatic contrast)

showFinishDates.description: Display finish date labels next to tasks/milestones

dateBackgroundColor.description: Set the background color for finish date labels

labelColor.description: Color for month labels (defaults to line color if unset)

labelFontSize.description: Font size for month labels (defaults to general font size if 0)

show.description: Show the vertical line indicating latest finish date

lineColor.description: Color of the project end line

lineWidth.description: Width of the project end line

lineStyle.description: Style of the project end line

labelColor.description: Color of the finish date label text

labelFontSize.description: Font size for the finish date label

baselineShow.description: Show the vertical line indicating baseline latest finish date

previousUpdateShow.description: Show the vertical line indicating previous update latest finish date

showFloatColumn.description: Display total float value next to task names

calculationMode.description: Choose between Longest Path (CPM) or Float-Based criticality

enableMultiPathToggle.description: Allow toggling between all driving paths of equal or near-equal duration

selectedPathIndex.description: Index of the currently selected driving path (1-based)

showPathInfo.description: Display path count and duration in the visual

show.description: Display the legend when a legend field is added

titleText.description: Custom title text (defaults to field name if empty)

defaultExpanded.description: Expand all WBS groups by default

showGroupSummary.description: Display a summary bar for each WBS group

groupHeaderColor.description: Background color for WBS group headers

groupSummaryColor.description: Color for WBS group summary bars

hideEmptyGroups.description: Hide WBS groups that have no visible/filtered tasks

expandCollapseAll.description: Toggle to expand or collapse all WBS groups at once

showWbsToggle.description: Show or hide the Expand/Collapse WBS toggle button in the header

groupNameFontSize.description: Font size for WBS group names (0 = use Task Name Font Size)

groupNameColor.description: Text color for WBS group names

wbsLevelStyles.description: Optional per-level overrides for WBS header background and text colors

timelineZoom.description: Microsoft-style axis zoom slider for the timeline

enableZoomSlider.description: Show zoom slider below the timeline for adjusting visible date range

sliderHeight.description: Height of the zoom slider control

sliderTrackColor.description: Background color of the slider track

sliderSelectedColor.description: Color of the selected/visible range area

showMiniChart.description: Show a miniature preview of task distribution in the slider
